attributes.action: Tuition funding for graduates wanting to re train in veterinary medicine
attributes.background: Their is currently no tuition funding for graduates wanting to do a second undergraduate degree in veterinary medicine / science in the UK costing between £36000 - £54000

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about funding for retaining in veterinary medicine but we are unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out the funding arrangements you would like the Government to introduce.
